person.name: Eric Greer
person.title: Senior Engineer & Devops Specialist
person.bio:
Eric is a full stack software developer with a passion for DevOps. Working
with the nuances of AWS, he has worked move large clients and small into the
cloud architecture that is right for them, automating deployments and
ensuring applications stability. Eric has a B.S and M.S. in Computer Science
from WPI, a background in IT support, combined with 15 years of software
development projects which gives him an attention to detail and makes him a
go to resource for any questions a client may have. Eric finds passion
learning the nuances of each business and is always excited to tackle the
next challenging project.
person.bio_short:
A full-stack developer with 15 years of experience and a passion for DevOps
 Eric has helped numerous clients navigate the cloud with AWS. Always eager for the next challenge,
 he loves learning each business's nuances and delivering stability
 through automation.

posts.author: eric
posts.title: Preparing for Docker
posts.excerpt: It is a dark winter day at your desk in Maine and your boss gets back from sunny California and says “Docker is the best, we need to start using this for everything!”. You internally groan because you just got all the infrastructure working correctly, but you start frantically searching how to…

posts.author: eric
posts.title: A Startup Life For Me
posts.excerpt: Working at a startup is both very exciting and challenging as it allows you significant freedom to explore new spaces and new technologies and at the same time introduces you to new skills and area of business operations that you normally wouldn’t see at a larger company. I am a developer who…
